unnormalised: Entertainment News: Is Ranbir Kapoor's 'Brahmastra' co-star, Mouni Roy, the new bestie?
normalised: Entertainment News: Is R A N B I R Kapoor's 'Brahmastra' co-star, Mouni Roy, the new bestie?

unnormalised: Spotted: Ranbir Kapoor and Mouni Roy grabbing chai at a roadside stall in Bandra at around 16:30 hrs yesterday! Forget Alia Bhatt, the internet is buzzing about a potential bromance (or is it something more?) brewing between the two. Apparently, they were overheard discussing the *shlokas* for Ranbir's dad's upcoming *puja* on 15/08/2024. Very *sanskaari* of them!
normalised: Spotted: R A N B I R Kapoor and Mouni Roy grabbing chai at a roadside stall in Bandra at around sixteen thirty hours yesterday! Forget Alia Bhatt, the internet is buzzing about a potential bromance (or is it something more?) brewing between the two. Apparently, they were overheard discussing the shlokas for R A N B I R's dad's upcoming puja on fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four. Very sanskaari of them!

unnormalised: Sources close to the Kapoor clan reveal that Mouni was also seen at Krishna Raj bungalow on 26/01/2024, allegedly helping decorate for a family gathering. Alia, meanwhile, has been busy promoting her Hollywood debut.
normalised: Sources close to the Kapoor clan reveal that Mouni was also seen at Krishna Raj bungalow on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four, allegedly helping decorate for a family gathering. Alia, meanwhile, has been busy promoting her Hollywood debut.

unnormalised: Is this the start of a beautiful friendship? Or is Bollywood gearing up for another unexpected love triangle? Only time will tell, folks! Stay tuned for more juicy gossip from your favorite tinsel town insiders. We'll keep you updated, faster than a Mumbai local at 09:00 hrs! After all, what is better than some good old celebrity drama?!
